Item ID21347

Amethyst is a type of mineral mined from amethyst crystals. Mining it requires the player to have a Mining level of 92, and grants 240 Mining experience.

It can be cut into certain Ranged materials with a chisel by a player with the appropriate Crafting level.

Wearing expert mining gloves while mining an amethyst crystal grants a 25% chance for the crystal to not deplete upon mining an amethyst, allowing you to mine an additional amethyst before depleting. The Varrock armour 4 double ore effect can also trigger when mining amethyst.

Products[edit | edit source]

Amethyst can be used to make the following items:

ItemMembersSkillsXPMaterials
Amethyst arrowtips × 15
  • 85
  • 60
  • 1 × Amethyst
Amethyst bolt tips × 15
  • 83
  • 60
  • 1 × Amethyst
Amethyst dart tip × 8
  • 89
  • 60
  • 1 × Amethyst
Amethyst javelin heads × 5
  • 87
  • 60
  • 1 × Amethyst

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Speaking to Utrec in the Mining Guild will reveal that the dwarves in Keldagrim use amethyst as a construction material.
  • During development, the mineral was planned to be named "quartz".[1] After player complaints on how common quartz is in real life, Jagex renamed the mineral as "amethyst", which is a rare and valuable variety of quartz.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ The Old School Team. "Dev Blog: Guild Expansions". 14 June 2017. Developers' Blogs. *

[[File:Amethyst detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Amethyst''' is a type of mineral mined from [[amethyst crystals]]. Mining it requires the player to have a [[Mining]] level of 92, and grants 240 Mining experience.

It can be cut into certain [[Ranged]] materials with a [[chisel]] by a player with the appropriate [[Crafting]] level.

Wearing [[expert mining gloves]] while mining an amethyst crystal grants a 25% chance for the crystal to not deplete upon mining an amethyst, allowing you to mine an additional amethyst before depleting. The [[Varrock armour 4]] double ore effect can also trigger when mining amethyst.

==Products==
Amethyst can be used to make the following items:

{{Uses material list|Amethyst}}

==Trivia==
*Speaking to [[Utrec]] in the [[Mining Guild]] will reveal that the [[dwarves]] in [[Keldagrim]] use amethyst as a construction material.
*During development, the mineral was planned to be named "quartz".{{CiteDevBlog|url=https://secure.runescape.com/m=news/a=13/dev-blog-guild-expansions?oldschool=1|author=The Old School Team|title=Dev Blog: Guild Expansions|blogdate=14 June 2017|accessdate=10 May 2020}} After player complaints on how common quartz is in real life, Jagex renamed the mineral as "amethyst", which is a rare and valuable variety of quartz.
